articles.title: Twitter goes crazy after Mahomes praised by broadcasters for putting trash in a garbage can - KMBC Kansas City
articles.description: Before the Kansas City Chiefs' 38-21 loss to the Los Angeles Chargers, Mahomes — who was resting for the playoffs — was caught by Fox Sports cameras picking up some trash and throwing it in a garbage can on the sideline at Arrowhead Stadium.
articles.content:
KANSAS CITY, Mo. —We already know that Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes can do it all.
